welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Napindan, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and breathtaking landscapes. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest and main international terminal at the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it is the smallest terminal at the airport and serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 2 hours per device.
